title: Just downloaded League of Legends logo opens but launcher wont start
body:
So umm i just recently downloaded league of legends on a new computer and the things is that every time i try to open it the logo pops and loads but after it disappears nothing happens i went online and tried to find solutions to my problem and most said to do something with the air clients and it said they were in projects after checking my project files it doesnt have any air clients and i tried looking up this too but nothing came up so i thought i would ask riot about it is this what is making my game unable to open?
I can not find anything anywhere about how to fix my problem after the logo disappears it says the patcher is running after  waiting like maybe like 45 minutes a message popped up saying Â¨BugsplatRC resouce DLL not found and i dont know what to do

replies.body:
Or you did a bad and downloaded the wrong operating file thing.
I mean you downloaded mac for pc or pc for mac.

Most of the time when this happens, it's a result of the League client not having the right permissions to interact or access specific files it relies on. This can typically be resolved by the steps inside our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), so I definitely recommend checking it out.

Let me know if those steps caused any change to this issue.
